To allow different templates for the same tag in different situations, a selector can be specified for a template.
The string against which Selectors are matched.
public function setCondition(Expression $cond)
Sets the condition for this node.
public function setDefault($value)
Sets the default value.
public function setElse(Statement $else)
Changes the statement used for the else part.
public function setFile($filename)
Specifies a Form description file from which form descriptions should be fetched.
public function setFile($filename)
Sets the form description file to parse.
public function setFromProperty(Property $prop)
Sets this node’s $checks, $required and values from a Property.
public function setOnChange($js)
Adds a piece of javascript to this node’s javascript event that triggers when the input is changed.
public function setOnChange($js)
Sets this node’s state change javascript event.
public function setOpts($opts)
Changes the value of options.
